> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16640?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [73930c5...3b8d318](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16640?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).
Well, this PR tried to replace the readme.md to Korean. I think here's no space for translated doc.

Indeed, we don't want our README in Korean. 
Having translations of the documentation is an interesting topic, but currently we don't have any infrastructure for that. It would also be a huge undertaking, so not sure we would like to go that way. In any case it should first be discussed separately. That said, if people want to make (partly) translations and host it themselves, that would be very nice projects, and I would certainly encourage that.
